body: Ah, a classic. Don't know how many times i've already read this, but each read was always worth it. Harem time, yeah boi
I ship souma x erina But I don't mind souma having a harem xD

I always have this reluctance to read doujinshi parodies of ongoing series cause it disturbs my memory about the series... like, it's not funny when I mix stuff. "Wait, Soma definitely did enjoy Megumi's 'hospitality' yesterday so why are they not - oh yeah, it's not canon." 
it gives headaches, believe me.
